name: Slenderman: Unbecoming
description:
Slenderman: Unbecoming is a new adaptation on Slenderman, the paranormal phenomenon. Slenderman: Unbecoming is a singleplayer horror game, based on the narrative of one lone protagonist, haunted by Slenderman. The game contains several missions, which describe the disturbing events of a park ranger, and brings back The Butterfly Effect, which are user-driven choices to alter your future.

What Will You Do? How Will You Survive?

Key Features:


Using the Butterfly Effect, meaning your in-game choices have consequences, you can play through the game making your own decisions.
Make the wrong decision, and you may pay the price. Story is driven by levels as a core mechanic.


Your Survival is up to you.
